name: Zork (S. Ballin' Games)
description:

Lucas Philips ..................................... Programmer

Description 

Zork is a dungeon crawler made entirely in Java.
The objective is to find the exit while slaying anything in your path. This was final for our Intro to Computer Science II in Fall of 2018 at East Tennessee State University.

Controls

Forward/Backward/Left/Right: Left-Click the corresponding arrow at the bottom.

Pause: Click the Top-Right of the window when there is no action or additional windows up.
